gui

Class GameViewAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • gui.GameViewAdapter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ViewModel

    public class GameViewAdapter
extends java.lang.Object
implements ViewModel
    Class responsible for communicating gui events to game logic.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Karolina Jonzen and Alexander Ekstrom
